scripts.dev: npm run copy:assets && concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && node cache-buster.js && node generar-sitemap.js
scripts.build:dist: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/image dist/webfonts dist/guia dist/components && cp *.html output.css bundle.min.js robots.txt sitemap.xml .htaccess dist/ && cp image/* dist/image/ && cp guia/* dist/guia/ && cp components/* dist/components/ && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* dist/webfonts/ && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css dist/fontawesome.min.css
